Song.title: Lamb of God
Song.copyright: Music and Words by Jason Hansen, Bob Kauflin, and David LaChance, Jr. © 2015 Sovereign Grace Praise (BMI). Sovereign Grace Music, a division of Sovereign Grace Churches.

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: O Lamb of [C]God, all worlds [F]obeyed Your [C] will From dark and [F] void their being[G] came O Lamb of [C]God, Your glories [F]echo [C] still Creation [F] sings its [Am]Maker’s [G] praise Eternal [Am]God, One with the [F]Fa[C/E]ther, before all [G]time You dwelt in[F] love Et[G]ernal [Am]God, unlike all [F]ot[C/E]hers, yet You de[F]scen[C/E]ded [G]unto [C]us [| C]
VERSE 2: O Lamb of [C]God, in filthy [F]manger[C] lay In humble[F] dress You entered[G] earth O Lamb of [C]God, Creator [F]bows to[C] save The needy [F] ones, help[Am]less from[G] birth Incarnate [Am]Word, gift of the [F]Fa[C/E]ther to take our [G]place and [Am]bear our[F] sin In[G]carnate[Am] Word led to the [F]slau[C/E]ghter, You conquered [F]death [C/E]and [G]rose a[Am]gain [| C6 | C | C6] You conquered [F]death [C/E]and [G]rose a[C (go right into interlude)]gain
Inter: [C - G/B - Am - C/G - F - Gsus G - C -F2/C]
Verse: [C]Ho[G/B]ly [Am]God, [C/G]in [F]love, [Gsus]be[G]-[| C]came [F2/C |] [C]Per[G/B]fect [Am]Man [C/G]to [Dm]bear [Fmaj7]my [Gsus]blame [G] [C]On [G/B]the [Am]cross [C/G]He [F]took [E7]my [E] [Am]sin [G/F]By [F]His [Em]death [Am]I [Gsus]live [G] [ ]a[C]gain [C]On [G/B]the [Am]cross [C/G]He [F]took [E7]my [E] [Am]sin [G/F]By [F]His [Em]death [Am]I [Gsus]live [G] [ ]a[C]gain [C/D - D]
{new_page} (BRIDGE): [G]No love is higher[G/C2] no love is wider [G/B]No love is deeper[C] no love is truer [G]No love is higher[G/C] no love is wider [G/B]No love is like Your[C] love O Lord
Verse 2: On the [G]mount of cruci[C2]fixion Fountains [G]opened deep and [D]wide Through the [G]floodgates of God's [C2]mercy Flowed a [G]vast and [D/F#]gracious [G]tide Grace and [G]love like mighty [D/G]rivers Poured incessant from [G]above Heav'n's [Em7]peace and perfect [C]justice Kissed a [G]guilty [D/F#]world in [G]love Grace and [G]love like mighty [D/G]rivers Poured incessant from [G]above Heav'n's [Em7]peace and perfect [C]justice Kissed a [G]guilty [D/F#]world in [G]love
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 o lamb of god all worlds obeyed your will from dark and void their being came o lamb of god your glories echo still creation sings its makers praise eternal god one with the father before all time you dwelt in love eternal god unlike all others yet you descended unto us verse 2 o lamb of god in filthy manger lay in humble dress you entered earth o lamb of god creator bows to save the needy ones helpless from birth incarnate word gift of the father to take our place and bear our sin incarnate word led to the slaughter you conquered death and rose again you conquered death and rose again inter verse holy god in love became perfect man to bear my blame on the cross he took my sin by his death i live again on the cross he took my sin by his death i live again bridge no love is higher no love is wider no love is deeper no love is truer no love is higher no love is wider no love is like your love o lord verse 2 on the mount of crucifixion fountains opened deep and wide through the floodgates of gods mercy flowed a vast and gracious tide grace and love like mighty rivers poured incessant from above heavns peace and perfect justice kissed a guilty world in love grace and love like mighty rivers poured incessant from above heavns peace and perfect justice kissed a guilty world in love

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: O Lamb of [C]God, all worlds [F]obeyed Your [C] will From dark and [F] void their being[G] came O Lamb of [C]God, Your glories [F]echo [C] still Creation [F] sings its [Am]Maker’s [G] praise Eternal [Am]God, One with the [F]Fa[C/E]ther, before all [G]time You dwelt in[F] love Et[G]ernal [Am]God, unlike all [F]ot[C/E]hers, yet You de[F]scen[C/E]ded [G]unto [C]us [| C]
VERSE 2: O Lamb of [C]God, in filthy [F]manger[C] lay In humble[F] dress You entered[G] earth O Lamb of [C]God, Creator [F]bows to[C] save The needy [F] ones, help[Am]less from[G] birth Incarnate [Am]Word, gift of the [F]Fa[C/E]ther to take our [G]place and [Am]bear our[F] sin In[G]carnate[Am] Word led to the [F]slau[C/E]ghter, You conquered [F]death [C/E]and [G]rose a[C]gain [| C6 | C | C6]
VERSE 3: O Lamb of [C]God now reigning [F] on the[C] throne The Judge of [F] all, faith[Am]ful and[G] true O Lamb of [C]God, You’ll make Your [F]power[C] known When all Your [F] foes rec[Am]eive their[G] due Victorious [Am]King, when history’s [F]fa[C/E]ding You’ll call Your [G]Bride to [Am]take her [F] place Vict[G]orious [Am]King, Creation’s [F]wai[C/E]ting For Your re[F]deemed [C/E]to [G]see Your[Am] face For Your re[Dm]deemed [C/E]to [G]see Your f[C]ace [| C6 | C | C6 | C]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 o lamb of god all worlds obeyed your will from dark and void their being came o lamb of god your glories echo still creation sings its makers praise eternal god one with the father before all time you dwelt in love eternal god unlike all others yet you descended unto us verse 2 o lamb of god in filthy manger lay in humble dress you entered earth o lamb of god creator bows to save the needy ones helpless from birth incarnate word gift of the father to take our place and bear our sin incarnate word led to the slaughter you conquered death and rose again verse 3 o lamb of god now reigning on the throne the judge of all faithful and true o lamb of god youll make your power known when all your foes receive their due victorious king when historys fading youll call your bride to take her place victorious king creations waiting for your redeemed to see your face for your redeemed to see your face
